*

Untitled

Nov 3, 2010

Hazy mists. A blindingly white shelf of sky rests over the land out of time. A horse, briefly. Two gurgling streams border a square plot of grassy land. Horse comes closer before turning around and playfully running through one of the streams. It stops in the square. Quietly, in the distance, the moans and shrieks of an approaching garbage truck.
